headline: Micron price target lowered to $130 from $140 at Wells Fargo
summary: Wells Fargo analyst Aaron Rakers lowered the firmâ€™s price target on Micron (MU) to $130 from $140 but keeps an Overweight rating on the shares ahead of its Q2 results.
